# IFileService.DeleteFileAsync method

Delete a file.

```csharp
public Task<DeleteFileResponse> DeleteFileAsync(string fileId)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| fileId | The ID of the file to use for this request |

DeleteFileResponse

## Remarks
